GSD36pars2_iu:10: agnir āpaś ca vedāś ca Par_12.21(20)a
GSD36pars2_iu:37: ata ūrdhvaṃ tu ye viprāḥ Par_8.15a
GSD36pars2_iu:141: ardhe bhukte tu yo vipras Par_12.41(40)a
GSD36pars2_iu:215: āpo hi ṣṭheti ca brāhmaṃ Par_12.10c
GSD36pars2_iu:238: iṣṭo vā yadi vā dveṣyo Par_1.40a
GSD36pars2_iu:304: eko hato yair bahubhiḥ sametair Par_9.48a
GSD36pars2_iu:314: etais tu gāvo na nibandhanīyā Par_9.33c
GSD36pars2_iu:361: kāmatas tu kṛtaṃ yat syān Par_12.79(78)a
GSD36pars2_iu:365: kāmān mohāt tu yā gacchet Par_10.30c
GSD36pars2_iu:401: kuśaiḥ pūtaṃ tu yat snānaṃ Par_12.31(30)a
GSD36pars2_iu:456: klībo duḥkhī ca kuṣṭhī ca Par_9.60c
GSD36pars2_iu:459: kṣaṇena yānty eva hi tatra vīrāḥ Par_3.36c
GSD36pars2_iu:600: caṇḍālīṃ vā śvapākīṃ vā hy Par_10.5a
GSD36pars2_iu:722: tatra tatra ca ye dvijāḥ Par_1.33b
GSD36pars2_iu:758: tad vadhaṃ tu na taṃ vidyāt Par_9.1c
GSD36pars2_iu:772: tasmāt tāṃ na tu dūṣayet Par_10.23d
GSD36pars2_iu:832: teṣāṃ bhuktvā ca pītvā ca Par_10.34a
GSD36pars2_iu:833: teṣu teṣu ca ye dvijāḥ Par_11.50d
GSD36pars2_iu:894: tryahaṃ snātvā ca pītvā ca Par_6.49c
GSD36pars2_iu:951: dahanti ye dvijās taṃ tu Par_5.24c
GSD36pars2_iu:1085: na ca goṣṭhe vased rātrau Par_9.56a
GSD36pars2_iu:1090: na tān śūdrān tyajed dvijaḥ Par_11.15d
GSD36pars2_iu:1117: na dharmo na ca śudhyati Par_10.3d
GSD36pars2_iu:1118: na nārikelair na ca śāṇavālaiḥ Par_9.33a
GSD36pars2_iu:1128: na vāpi mauñjair na ca valkaśṛṅkhalaiḥ Par_9.33b
GSD36pars2_iu:1446: baddhā syād gaur mṛtā yadi Par_9.6d
GSD36pars2_iu:1566: bhuñjāno hi vaded yas tu Par_12.40(39)c
GSD36pars2_iu:1723: yas tu kruddhaḥ pumān brūyāj Par_12.57(56)a
GSD36pars2_iu:1733: yasyāhave tu praviśec ca vaktram Par_3.38b
GSD36pars2_iu:1735: yaṃ yajñasaṃghais tapasā ca viprāḥ Par_3.36a
GSD36pars2_iu:1757: yuge yuge ca ye dharmās Par_1.33a
GSD36pars2_iu:1758: yuge yuge tu ye dharmās Par_11.50c
GSD36pars2_iu:2080: sakṛd bhuktā tu yā nārī Par_10.25a
GSD36pars2_iu:2087: sa cauraḥ sa ca pāpiṣṭho Par_2.12a
GSD36pars2_iu:2116: sa mūḍhaḥ sa ca pāpiṣṭho Par_12.42(41)c
GSD36pars2_iu:2166: sa hy ārdhika iti jñeyo Par_11.24c
GSD36pars2_iu:2196: sā tu naṣṭā pare loke Par_10.31a
GSD36pars2_iu:2209: sukṣetre ca supātre ca hy Par_1.47c
GSD36pars2_iu:2246: striyaṃ vā yas tu ghātayet Par_6.16b
GSD36pars2_iu:2247: striyo vṛddhāś ca bālāś ca Par_7.35c
GSD36pars2_iu:2275: snehād vā yadi vā bhayāt Par_4.1b
GSD36pars2_iu:2276: snehād vā yadi vā lobhād Par_6.56c
GSD36pars2_iu:2284: spṛṣṭvā voḍhvā ca dagdhvā ca Par_5.11c
GSD36pars2_iu:2306: hataṃ daivaṃ ca pitryaṃ ca Par_12.41(40)c
